text: Tokyo Dawn Records is an independent record label based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany. The label carries origins in the demoscene and was established 1997 as one of the first netlabels worldwide to promote "opensource music". The label was relaunched in 2009 with a new concept. Tokyo Dawn Records is headed by Marc Wallowy and Fabien Schivre and is the home of aspiring and established artists and musicians related to broken beat, neo soul, funk, house, electro, hip hop and other genres.http://www.tokyodawn.net/http://www.discogs.com/label/Tokyo%20Dawn%20Records/ The label is also known for its eclectic compilation series "The Boogie", "The Heart" and "The Move". In 2011, Tokyo Dawn Records released two award winning digital audio processors under the sub-label "Tokyo Dawn Labs".KVR Audio Developer Challenge 2012♙ == Artist Roster == {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- style="background:#ccc;" ! style="text-align:center;"|Act ! style="text-align:center;"|Albums under the label |- |Amalia |style="text-align:center;"|2 |- |Blaktroniks |style="text- align:center;"|1 |- |Colonel Red |style="text-align:center;"|1 |- |Comfort Fit |style="text-align:center;"|3 |- |Daz-I-Kue |style="text-align:center;"|– |- |Opolopo |style="text-align:center;"|2 |- |Personal Life |style="text- align:center;"|1 |- |Portformat |style="text-align:center;"|3 |- |Positive Flow |style="text-align:center;"|1 |- |Pugs Atomz |style="text- align:center;"|1 |- |Reggie B |style="text-align:center;"|1 |- |Soulparlor |style="text-align:center;"|1 |- |Swede:art |style="text-align:center;"|2 |- |Vindahl |style="text-align:center;"|1 |- |The Grey Area |1 |} == Record Releases == * Various -
